body_text: Can you name this shoujo manga? I read the start of this manga once, it was about this girl who accidentally cut off this guy's hair and after that she becomes involved with him or something. She also has a sister who dresses up a lot, but she's not into that at all for some reason. I know that's not much to go on, but sadly that's all I remember reading!

A shoujo manga about a girl who cuts a guy's hair in the middle of class and later fixes it This manga is about a high school girl who loves doing her sister's hair in the mornings, but she doesn't do her own hair because she thinks it won't suit her. One day at school, she cuts a guy's hair in the middle of class. Later she fixes it, and then the story progresses. That's all I can remember, thank you.
